# Generated API Code

This directory contains auto-generated code from the OpenAPI specification.

## ⚠️ DO NOT EDIT MANUALLY

All files in this directory are automatically generated by `oapi-codegen` from the OpenAPI specification at `docs/api/openapi.yaml`.

Any manual changes will be overwritten when the code is regenerated.

## Generation

To regenerate the code:

```bash
make gen-api
```

Or directly:

```bash
./scripts/gen-api.sh
```

## Contents

- `api.gen.go` - Generated types, server interfaces, and request/response models

## Implementation

To implement the API:

1. Review the generated `ServerInterface` in `api.gen.go`
2. Create handler implementations in `internal/interface/api/handler/`
3. Wire up the handlers in `internal/interface/api/router.go`

## Source of Truth

The OpenAPI specification at `docs/api/openapi.yaml` is the Single Source of Truth (SSOT) for all API contracts.

To add or modify endpoints:
1. Update `docs/api/openapi.yaml`
2. Run `make gen-api` to regenerate code
3. Implement the new/modified handlers
